review.comment:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service, I have used it 2 times and I do not regret it. Attention like few others, completely personalized. They are the best, if there were more than 5 stars, I would give them to them. 100% trust.
Thank you Yisset without you it would not be possible.

(Original)
Excelente servicio, lo he utilizado 2 veces y no me arrepiento. Unas atenciones como pocas, completamente personalizado. Son los mejores si hubiera mas de 5 estrella se las doy. Confianza 100%.
Gracias Yisset sin ti no fuera posible.

(Translated by Google) If you want a reliable travel agency, I would define you, a personalized treatment with each of your clients, the best prices in the market and the advice of Yisset and her husband Elliot is extraordinary. Thanks for everything

(Original)
Si quieres una agencia de viaje confiable los definiría a ustedes , un trato personalizado con cada uno de sus clientes , los mejores precios del mercado y la asesoría de Yisset y su esposo Elliot es extraordinaria . Gracias por todo
review.review_reply:
Thank you Osmily,

We are happy to hear you had a positive experience with us. We value your input and Thank you for taking the time to give your feedback.

review.comment:
Thanks to Travel Shop US my family enjoy a awesome vacation in Punta Cana DR.
Travel Shop US have professional team and a awesome service..
Thanks a lot
review.review_reply:
Thank you for the nice feedback Brian :)

Travelshops.us

review.comment:
(Translated by Google) Excellent services via WhatsApp, very friendly and attentive. Very good offers in excellent hotels in the Dominican Republic (Punta Cana), I appreciated choosing TravelShops.us. I hope to see new offers with them, to book again with TravelShops.us.

(Original)
Excelentes servicios vía Whatsapp, muy amable y atentos. Muy buenas ofertas en excelentes hoteles de la República Dominicana (Punta Cana), agradecí elegir a TravelShops.us. Espero ver nuevas ofertas con ellos, para volver a reservar con TravelShops.us.
review.review_reply:
Thank you for the nice feedback Anthony :)

Travelshops.us

review.comment:
(Translated by Google) I love the services, always attentive and looking for the best prices, they always make us excellent recommendations. Thank you very much Travelshops family. I share photos of our last trip with you .. Hilton La Romana

Me encantan los servicios, siempre atentos y buscando los mejores precios, siempre nos hacen excelentes recomendaciones. Muchas gracias familia Travelshops. Les comparto fotos de nuestro último viaje con ustedes.. Hilton La Romana
